wikipedia_page.main: Oscar Horace Stanley Linkson (16 March 1888 – 8 August 1916) was an English footballer.

response: On 8 August 1916 while Fighting in France during the First World War, United former player Private Oscar Linkson went missing in the battle to seize Guillemont Station during the Battle of the Somme. His body was never recovered and he was recorded as missing presumed dead.
